title: Check those Files
content: This is the First File   Diagram 1  Diagram 2

title: Diagram 1
content: Diagram 1 diagram_1.bpmn .diagram-note { background-color: green; opacity: 0.4; pointer-events: none; } html, body, #canvas { height: 200%; padding: 0; margin: 0; } div#canvas { height: 500px; }     var diagramUrl = document.getElementById("canvas").innerText var bpmnViewer = new BpmnJS({ container: '#canvas', additionalModules: [ { moveCanvas: [ 'value', null ], } ] }); async function openDiagram(bpmnXML) { try { await bpmnViewer.importXML(bpmnXML).then(function(){ console.log("hier") var eventBus = bpmnViewer.get('eventBus'); console.log(eventBus) var events = [ 'element.click', ];console.log(events) events.forEach(function(event) { eventBus.on(event, function(e) { console.log(event, 'on', e.element); console.log(e.element.label) console.log(e.element.businessObject.name) }); }); }).catch(function(err) { console.error('failed to load diagram'); console.error(err); return log('failed to load diagram', err); }); var canvas = bpmnViewer.get('canvas'); var overlays = bpmnViewer.get('overlays'); var k = canvas.zoom('fit-viewport'); overlays.add('SCAN_OK', 'note', { position: { bottom: 100, right: 100 }, html: 'Mixed up the labels?' }); canvas.addMarker('SCAN_OK', 'needs-discussion'); } catch (err) { console.error('could not import BPMN 2.0 diagram', err); } } $.get(diagramUrl, openDiagram, 'text');

title: Diagram 2
content: Diagram 2 diagram_2.bpmn .diagram-note { background-color: green; opacity: 0.4; pointer-events: none; } html, body, #canvas { height: 200%; padding: 0; margin: 0; } div#canvas { height: 500px; }     var diagramUrl = document.getElementById("canvas").innerText var bpmnViewer = new BpmnJS({ container: '#canvas', additionalModules: [ { moveCanvas: [ 'value', null ], } ] }); async function openDiagram(bpmnXML) { try { await bpmnViewer.importXML(bpmnXML).then(function(){ console.log("hier") var eventBus = bpmnViewer.get('eventBus'); console.log(eventBus) var events = [ 'element.click', ];console.log(events) events.forEach(function(event) { eventBus.on(event, function(e) { console.log(event, 'on', e.element); console.log(e.element.label) console.log(e.element.businessObject.name) }); }); }).catch(function(err) { console.error('failed to load diagram'); console.error(err); return log('failed to load diagram', err); }); var canvas = bpmnViewer.get('canvas'); var overlays = bpmnViewer.get('overlays'); var k = canvas.zoom('fit-viewport'); overlays.add('SCAN_OK', 'note', { position: { bottom: 100, right: 100 }, html: 'Mixed up the labels?' }); canvas.addMarker('SCAN_OK', 'needs-discussion'); } catch (err) { console.error('could not import BPMN 2.0 diagram', err); } } $.get(diagramUrl, openDiagram, 'text');
